CustomField.description: Stores the name of the external credential linked to the named credential used in the token/authorise/userinfo endpoints. Unfortunately, this information is not implicit, so the name needs to be specified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the name of the external credential linked to the named credential used in the token/authorise/userinfo endpoints. Unfortunately, this information is not implicit, so the name needs to be specified.
CustomField.label: External Credential Name
